REGULATIONS – PROCEDURES

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation=”” row_type=”row” use_row_as_full_screen_section=”no” type=”full_width” angled_section=”no” text_align=”left” background_image_as_pattern=”without_pattern” z_index=””][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1575835851507{padding-left: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1580399345486{background-color: #ffffff !important;}” el_class=”content-section curved-bottom-right space16″]

As part of the operation of UNIWA, a number of regulations and procedures — aimed at the proper and harmonious operation of the entire academic community in matters related to its educational and administrative functioning — have been put into effect and are being implemented.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

As part of the operation of UNIWA, a number of regulations and procedures — aimed at the proper and harmonious operation of the entire academic community in matters related to its educational and administrative functioning — have been put into effect and are being implemented.
